means: 巴塔哥尼亚（南美一地区）

sentence.Network_en: This huge mountain chain continues the great spine that runs from Patagonia to Alaska.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个巨大的山脉向北延伸,从巴塔哥尼亚高原直抵阿拉斯加的山脊.

sentence.Network_en: Peninsula Valdes in Patagonia is a site of global significance for the conservation of marine mammals.
sentence.Network_cn: 位于巴塔哥尼亚地区的瓦尔德斯半岛是全球海洋哺乳动物资源的重点保护区.

sentence.Network_en: Ted Turner, the communications magnate, also has bought land in Argentine Patagonia an eye to conservation.
sentence.Network_cn: 媒体巨子泰德·透纳着眼于环境保育, 也买下阿根廷巴塔哥尼亚土地.
